name: Business Model Canvas
description:
Business Model Canvas is a strategic design and lean startup template for developing new or documenting existing business models. It is a visual chart with elements describing a service's or product's value proposition, infrastructure, customers, and finances.


We will release 30+ additional workshop and design thinking templates that can be used in your Design Projects. Follow us on platforms below to get updates.
